info.title: article-api
info.description:
Searching and fetching all articles published on the NDLA platform.

The Article API provides an endpoint for searching and fetching articles. Different meta-data is attached to the returned articles, and typical examples of this are language and license.
Includes endpoints to filter Articles on different levels, and retrieve single articles.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all previously used tags in articles.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Return only articles with content matching the specified query.

parameters.name: page-size
parameters.description: The number of search hits to display for each page.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of the search hits to display.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The ISO 639-1 language code describing language.

get.summary: Fetch articles that matches ids parameter.
get.description: Returns articles that matches ids parameter.

parameters.name: FeideAuthorization
parameters.description: Header containing FEIDE access token.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Return only articles that have one of the provided ids. To provide multiple ids, separate by comma (,).

parameters.name: fallback
parameters.description: Fallback to existing language if language is specified.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The ISO 639-1 language code describing language.

parameters.name: page-size
parameters.description: The number of search hits to display for each page.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of the search hits to display.

get.summary: Get RSS feed for articles at a level in the frontpage menu

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Slug of the article to generate RSS for

parameters.name: article_id
parameters.description: Id or slug of the article that is to be fetched.

parameters.name: revision
parameters.description: Revision of article to fetch. If not provided the current revision is returned.

parameters.name: FeideAuthorization
parameters.description: Header containing FEIDE access token.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The ISO 639-1 language code describing language.

parameters.name: fallback
parameters.description: Fallback to existing language if language is specified.

get.description: Returns all articles. You can search it too.

parameters.name: FeideAuthorization
parameters.description: Header containing FEIDE access token.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Return only articles with content matching the specified query.

parameters.name: articleTypes
parameters.description: Return only articles of specific type(s). To provide multiple types, separate by comma (,).

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Return only articles that have one of the provided ids. To provide multiple ids, separate by comma (,).

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The ISO 639-1 language code describing language.

parameters.name: license
parameters.description: Return only results with provided license. Specifying 'all' gives all articles regardless of licence.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of the search hits to display.

parameters.name: page-size
parameters.description: The number of search hits to display for each page.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
The sorting used on results.
             The following are supported: -relevance, relevance, -title, title, -lastUpdated, lastUpdated, -id, id.
             Default is by -relevance (desc) when query is set, and id (asc) when query is empty.

parameters.name: fallback
parameters.description: Fallback to existing language if language is specified.

parameters.name: search-context
parameters.description:
A unique string obtained from a search you want to keep scrolling in. To obtain one from a search, provide one of the following values: [0,initial,start,first].
When scrolling, the parameters from the initial search is used, except in the case of 'language' and 'fallback'.
This value may change between scrolls. Always use the one in the latest scroll result (The context, if unused, dies after 1m).
If you are not paginating past 10000 hits, you can ignore this and use 'page' and 'page-size' instead.

parameters.name: grep-codes
parameters.description: A comma separated list of codes from GREP API the resources should be filtered by.

parameters.name: FeideAuthorization
parameters.description: Header containing FEIDE access token.

get.summary: Fetch list of existing revisions for article-id
get.description: Fetch list of existing revisions for article-id

parameters.name: article_id
parameters.description: Id or slug of the article that is to be fetched.

get.summary: Get id of article corresponding to specified deprecated node id.
get.description: Get internal id of article for a specified ndla_node_id.

parameters.name: deprecated_node_id
parameters.description: Id of deprecated NDLA node

get.summary: Get all ids related to article corresponding to specified deprecated node id.
get.description: Get internal id as well as all deprecated ndla_node_ids of article for a specified ndla_node_id.

parameters.name: deprecated_node_id
parameters.description: Id of deprecated NDLA node

ArticleContentV2DTO.title: ArticleContentV2DTO
ArticleContentV2DTO.description: The content of the article in available languages

language.description: ISO 639-1 code that represents the language used in the content

id.description: The unique id of the article

language.description: The ISO 639-1 language code describing which article translation this introduction belongs to
The ISO 639-1 language code describing which article translation this meta description belongs to

ArticleMetaImageDTO.description: A meta image for the article

alt.description: The alt text for the meta image

language.description: The ISO 639-1 language code describing which article translation this meta description belongs to
The ISO 639-1 language code describing language used in query-params

license.description: Return only articles with provided license.

page.description: The page number of the search hits to display.

pageSize.description: The number of search hits to display for each page.

ids.description: Return only articles that have one of the provided ids

articleTypes.description: Return only articles of specific type(s)

fallback.description: Return all matched articles whether they exist on selected language or not.

scrollId.description: A search context retrieved from the response header of a previous search.

grepCodes.description: A comma separated list of codes from GREP API to filter by.

ArticleSummaryV2DTO.title: ArticleSummaryV2DTO
ArticleSummaryV2DTO.description: Short summary of information about the article

id.description: The unique id of the article

url.description: The full url to where the complete information about the article can be found

license.description: Describes the license of the article

articleType.description: The type of article this is. Possible values are frontpage-article, standard, topic-article

lastUpdated.description: The time when the article was last updated

supportedLanguages.description: A list of available languages for this article

grepCodes.description: A list of codes from GREP API attached to this article

availability.description: Value that dictates who gets to see the article. Possible values are: everyone/teacher

traits.description: Traits extracted from the article content

language.description: ISO 639-1 code that represents the language used in tag

title.description: The freetext title of the article

htmlTitle.description: The freetext html-version title of the article

language.description: ISO 639-1 code that represents the language used in title

id.description: The unique id of the article

oldNdlaUrl.description: Link to article on old platform

revision.description: The revision number for the article

requiredLibraries.description: Required libraries in order to render the article

updated.description: When the article was last updated

updatedBy.description: By whom the article was last updated

published.description: When the article was last published

articleType.description: The type of article this is. Possible values are frontpage-article, standard, topic-article

grepCodes.description: A list of codes from GREP API connected to the article

conceptIds.description: A list of conceptIds connected to the article

availability.description: Value that dictates who gets to see the article. Possible values are: everyone/teacher

relatedContent.description: A list of content related to the article

revisionDate.description: The date for the next planned revision which indicates when the article might be outdated

slug.description: The path to the frontpage article

traits.description: Traits extracted from the article content

name.description: The name of the of the author

ContributorType.title: ContributorType
ContributorType.description: The description of the author. Eg. Photographer or Supplier

CopyrightDTO.description: Describes the copyright information for the article

origin.description: Reference to where the article is procured

validFrom.description: Date from which the copyright is valid

validTo.description: Date to which the copyright is valid

code.description: Code stating the type of error

LicenseDTO.description: Describes the license of the article

code.description: Code stating the type of error

url.description: The url to where the article can be viewed

RequiredLibraryDTO.title: RequiredLibraryDTO
RequiredLibraryDTO.description: Information about a library required to render the article

mediaType.description: The type of the library. E.g. CSS or JavaScript

totalCount.description: The total number of articles matching this query

page.description: For which page results are shown from

Sort.title: Sort
Sort.description: The sorting used on results. Default is by -relevance.

totalCount.description: The total number of tags matching this query

page.description: For which page results are shown from

pageSize.description: The number of results per page

code.description: Code stating the type of error

ValidationMessage.title: ValidationMessage
ValidationMessage.description: A message describing a validation error on a specific field

field.description: The field the error occured in

visualElement.description: Html containing the visual element. May contain any legal html element, including the embed-tag

language.description: The ISO 639-1 language code describing which article translation this visual element belongs to
